name: Hangover Brothers
description:
Hangover Brothers is a co-op game where you and your friends have had a party at your house, but the drunkards have been creating a big mess, getting the house dirty and disordering everything.

Join a friend and try to keep the drunkards away, and clean the house at the same, trying to survive through some crazy houses in this party game!

Features

  • Fun co-op gameplay!
  • Survive through 10 crazy levels!
  • Play with 4 different characters based on party personalities!
